title: Bramão (Dr. Alberto Allen Pereira de Sequeira)
original_title: Bramão (Dr. Alberto Allen Pereira de Sequeira)
body: He was a deputy for Madeira in the 1901 legislature. He was born in 1866. He is a renowned poet, and his volume of poetry Lost Illusions was translated into French and Italian.

Dr. Alberto Allen Pereira de Sequeira Br: Deputy for Madeira in the 1901 legislature, renowned poet

1901: Legislature in which he was a deputy for Madeira
